sentences.en: "We're all talking at the same time." — "Yeah. Sorry."
sentences.cn: “我们俩在同时讲话。”——“噢，抱歉。”

sentences.en: A surprising number of customers order the same sandwich every day.
sentences.cn: 每天点同一种三明治的顾客多得惊人。

sentences.en: All the bills had the same serial number. The cash was counterfeit.
sentences.cn: 所有钞票的序列号都是一样的。这些钱是伪钞。

sentences.en: Dividing his command, Morgan assailed both strongholds at the same time.
sentences.cn: 摩根派遣部队同时袭击了两个据点。

sentences.en: Driving a boat is not the same as driving a car.
sentences.cn: 驾船和开车不是一回事。

sentences.en: Everyone had to dress the same as a well-known historical figure.
sentences.cn: 每个人都必须装扮成一位历史名人。

sentences.en: He sits in the same chair every night.
sentences.cn: 他每天晚上都坐在同一把椅子上。

sentences.en: He’s the same old Peter – moody and irritable.
sentences.cn: 他还是以前那个彼得——喜怒无常且爱发火。

sentences.en: Her perfume has always had the same effect on me.
sentences.cn: 她身上的香水给我的感觉一如既往。

sentences.en: I don't know how often I heard the same awful jokes.
sentences.cn: 这种千篇一律的烂笑话我不知道听过多少回了。

sentences.en: If it’s all the same to you, I’ll go this weekend.
sentences.cn: 如果你无所谓的话，我这个周末去。

sentences.en: In the same instant he flung open the car door.
sentences.cn: 与此同时，他猛地推开了车门。

sentences.en: it was all the same to me where it was being sold.
sentences.cn: 它在哪里销售对我来说无所谓。

sentences.en: it was all the same to me where it was being sold.
sentences.cn: 它在哪里销售对我来说无所谓。

sentences.en: it's a very creative place, but at the same time it's very relaxing.
sentences.cn: 这是个非常有创造性的地方，然而又是个能使人松弛的地方。

sentences.en: Matt is weak and dependent, but you love him all the same.
sentences.cn: 马特软弱无能且依赖性强，但我们照样爱他。

sentences.en: Reggie reacted with the same affronted horror Midge had felt.
sentences.cn: 雷吉的反应是又羞愤又害怕，和米奇的感觉一样。

sentences.en: she knew they had meant it kindly, but it had hurt all the same.
sentences.cn: 她知道他们是出于好意，但还是伤害了她。

sentences.en: The coins may look the same but one’s a forgery.
sentences.cn: 这些硬币虽然看起来一样，但其中有一个是假币。

sentences.en: the game's fantasy setting is the same old, same old.
sentences.cn: 这款游戏的奇幻背景还是老样子。

sentences.en: The newspaper job had me doing the same thing day after day.
sentences.cn: 这份报社的工作让我日复一日地做着同样的事。

sentences.en: The report suggested that the same trend was at work in politics.
sentences.cn: 这份报告表明，同一趋势也在影响着政治。

sentences.en: The three children all bath in the same bath water.
sentences.cn: 这三个小孩用同一盆水洗澡。

sentences.en: the very same people who practised all the rules are now the most sceptical.
sentences.cn: 正是执行所有这些规则的人现在最怀疑这些规则。

sentences.en: We had this understanding that courses were roughly the same weight.
sentences.cn: 我们已经了解到各门功课差不多一样重要。

sentences.en: We were in the same college, which was male-only at that time.
sentences.cn: 我们那时在同一所学院，当时只招男生。

sentences.en: With stockbroking it was the same thing, year in year out.
sentences.cn: 证券经纪工作每年都重复着一成不变的内容。

trans.tran_cn: 同一事物，同样的人，（和…）同样的事物，（数目、颜色、大小、质量等）相同
trans.tran_en: used to say that two or more people or things are exactly like each other
